Question: Sibros CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sibros

Product: Deep Connected Platform™

- Awarded "Connected Car Platform of the Year" in the 2024 IoT Breakthrough Awards Program
- ISO-26262 ASIL-D certified automotive OTA solution
- Partnership with Continental Engineering Services to revolutionize connected mobility
- "On the Track and Beyond" Experience at CES 2024 featuring Racing Simulator, Theater Sessions, and Partner Showcases
- In-booth session on decision intelligence in the automotive revolution with App Orchid Inc. showcasing AI/ML and Deep Logger for Predictive Diagnostics and Analytics

Learn more at: https://bit.ly/47mSDZ6
Summary_cn:
Sibros

产品：深度连接平台™

- 荣获2024年物联网突破奖“年度连接车平台”奖
- ISO-26262 ASIL-D认证的汽车OTA解决方案
- 与大陆工程服务公司合作，革新连接出行
- CES 2024“赛道与更多体验”活动，包括赛车模拟器、剧院会议和合作伙伴展示
- 展位上有关决策智能的演示，App Orchid Inc.展示AI/ML和预测性诊断与分析的深度记录器

了解更多信息，请访问：https://bit.ly/47mSDZ6
